title: The 15 best Christmas lights switch-on events around the UK
text:
The 2019 festive season is almost upon us, and so towns and cities across the UK are planning their Christmas lights switch-on parties. Becoming more elaborate with each year, there’s top-class entertainment in store and special guests including the likes of the London Mayor and, of course, Father Christmas himself. Plus the promise of some spectacular illuminations across Britain.

Whether you’re Yule Tide-obsessed or just fancy an excuse to sip mulled wine all night and eat copious mince pies, these are the best Christmas lights events across the UK.

Carnaby Street, London; November 7

What better way to start the festive season than on one of London’s top shopping streets? Carnaby is having an all-singing, all-dancing party this year, with a special line-up of live music and entertainment. Full details are yet to be released, but last year was Queen-themed, to celebrate the release of Bohemian Rhapsody; and the year before carnival themed, including elaborate costume parades and plenty of dancing in the street. This year they’re promising a “never before seen” Christmas installation, as well as 20 per cent off over 100 shops, bars and restaurants. Perfect for some early Christmas shopping.
